items.title: Thermostat
items.description: Keep set to 22°C/72°F for comfort. Turn off when opening windows or leaving for extended periods.

items.title: Water Heater
items.description: If hot water runs out, wait 30 minutes for tanks to reheat. Reset switch lives in the utility closet.

items.title: Lights + Shades
items.description: Tap ‘Home’ on the keypad to wake lights. Double tap to raise sheers in the living room.

items.title: Doors
items.description: Sliding glass doors auto-lock. Wave your fob at the reader to unlock from outside.

items.title: Before You Leave
items.description: Secure windows, set AC to 24°C, place keys in the stone bowl, and start the dishwasher on Eco.

items.title: Laundry
items.description: Leave used towels in the hampers. Fresh linens live under the bed bench if needed.

items.title: Power Trip
items.description: Breaker panel hides behind the kitchen art print. Toggle the orange switch to reset.

items.title: Water Pressure
items.description: City refill drops pressure around 23:00 for ~20 min — normal. Ping concierge if longer.
